text: Ceroplesis revoili is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Fairmaire in 1882. It is known from Kenya, Ethiopia, Tanzania, and Somalia.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis revoili. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Ceroplesis revoili pauli Fairmaire, 1884 * Ceroplesis revoili revoili Fairmaire, 1882 ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1882
title: Ceroplesis revoili
